import React from "react"; import "./booking.css"; import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({ tour }) => { const { price, reviews, avgRating } = tour return <>

${price}/per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
In
}; export default Booking;
